body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line: 
>
/kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**: got an error when trying to use a fieldSelector when watching a custom resource

**What you expected to happen**: no error

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

1. Create a CRD and then a CR for it.
1. Try to watch with a fieldSelector, such as `metadata.name=b1`

```
I0821 16:05:00.053529    2067 round_trippers.go:383] GET https://172.17.0.1:6443/apis/ark.heptio.com/v1/namespaces/heptio-ark/downloadrequests?fieldSelector=metadata.name%3Db1&resourceVersion=174842&watch=true
I0821 16:05:00.053540    2067 round_trippers.go:390] Request Headers:
I0821 16:05:00.053547    2067 round_trippers.go:393]     Accept: application/json, */*
I0821 16:05:00.053553    2067 round_trippers.go:393]     User-Agent: main/v1.7.3 (linux/amd64) kubernetes/$Format
I0821 16:05:00.056961    2067 round_trippers.go:408] Response Status: 400 Bad Request in 3 milliseconds
I0821 16:05:00.057028    2067 round_trippers.go:411] Response Headers:
I0821 16:05:00.057036    2067 round_trippers.go:414]     Content-Type: application/json
I0821 16:05:00.057040    2067 round_trippers.go:414]     Content-Length: 155
I0821 16:05:00.057043    2067 round_trippers.go:414]     Date: Mon, 21 Aug 2017 20:05:00 GMT
I0821 16:05:00.057058    2067 request.go:991] Response Body: {"kind":"Status","apiVersion":"v1","metadata":{},"status":"Failure","message":"unstructured cannot convert field labels","reason":"BadRequest","code":400}
```


**Anything else we need to know?**:

The customresource `REST` implementation has a `PredicateFunc` defined, and it looks like it should support at least a field selector for `metadata.namespace` and `metadata.name`, but I'm guessing we need a bit more in place to make this work for `meta/v1/unstructured`.

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): HEAD (commit baf2f85e738d83e8be6d1d75fed3a203b529a887)

/sig api-machinery
@deads2k @enisoc @sttts @nikhita 

I can try to submit a PR to fix once I finish my current work item, if nobody picks this up sooner.

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: Unable to use a fieldSelector with custom resources
